short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight notepad for managing and copying text snippets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop juggling multiple copied texts or losing important snippets to your clipboard history. With one click, capture and retrieve any text you need, right from your browser toolbar. Clean interface to keep your workflow smooth, so you can focus on what matters – getting work done.

## Key Features
- Unlimited snippets → Store as much as you need without artificial limits
- One-click copy → Instantly grab any snippet without keyboard shortcuts
- Free forever → All features included, no surprise paywalls
- Local storage only → Your data never leaves your browser
- Zero tracking → No analytics, no data collection
- No ads → Keep your workspace clean and distraction-free
- Quick access toolbar → Get your text in two clicks from any tab
- Persistent storage → Your text stays safe even when you close your browser
- Auto-organization → Your snippets stay neat without manual sorting
- Bulk delete → Clean up multiple entries in seconds
- Auto-expanding fields → Never run out of space for new snippets
- Minimal interface → Focus on your content, not complex menus


## Perfect For
• Content creators managing multiple snippets of text
• Developers storing code snippets and commands
• Customer service representatives using response templates
• Students collecting research notes and citations
• Anyone who frequently copies and pastes text

## Privacy & Security
• All data stored locally in your browser
• No tracking or analytics
• No data collection
• Complete privacy protection

## My Commitment
CopyPad Pro is and always will be completely free, with all features included. I believe in creating sustainable, community-supported tools that enhance productivity without compromising on quality or user experience.

## Support the Development
While CopyPad Pro is free forever, you can support its continued development through optional donations. Every contribution helps maintain and improve this tool for everyone.

## Privacy Policy
CopyPad Pro respects your privacy. The extension stores all data locally in your browser and does not collect, transmit, or share any personal information. We do not use tracking, analytics, or any form of data collection.

- Chrome 88 or later

  - Clipboard (for copy functionality)
